Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Northbound Reroute near Milwaukee/Armitage
ShortDescription: Northbound 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Western, Fullerton, and Milwaukee, due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Armitage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Western, Fullerton, and Milwaukee, due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Armitage.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #76 Diversey Temporary Westbound Reroute near Diversey/Kimball
ShortDescription: Westbound 76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted via Diversey, Kedzie, Milwaukee and Logan Blvd: due to,street blockage near Diversey/Kimball.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted via Diversey, Kedzie, Milwaukee and Logan Blvd: due to,street blockage near Diversey/Kimball.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
